title: Standing Finance Committee approves additional $3b expenditure - TT Newsday
content: Standing Finance Committee approves additional $3b expenditure  TT Newsday
description: THE Standing Finance Committee of the House of Representatives approved a sum of $3,081,703,900 in supplementary allocations for fiscal 2022, when it sat on May 13. The allocations cover 80 heads of expenditure, some of which are government ministries. This approval took place ahead of a 1.30 pm sitting of the House of Representatives on â€¦ Continue reading Standing Finance Committee approves additional $3b expenditure
